item.title: Help me set max players.. :(
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

i cant set max players on my server, its confusein :\

PIMPSCAPE BASE[br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2007, 06:45:51 PM[/size][hr]ok… new info… i THOUGHT this would work… but… alas…it hasnt

i did this in server.java

[code]public static int MaxConnections = 20;
public static String[] Connections = new String[MaxConnections];
public static int[] ConnectionCount = new int[MaxConnections];
public static boolean ShutDown = false;
public static int ShutDownCounter = 0;

}
[/code]

what i miss… i saved, and compiled… butran it and i went more then max… help?

Read full topic
